artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Chen Chun
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 東風日夜発　桃李不禁吹　検点濃華事　辛夷落較遅　陳淳 Chen Shun
markings: red combined kiwame 極 censor seal and artist\'s Manji 卍 seal
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Saki no Hokusai Iitsu hitsu 前北斎為一筆
title: Java Sparrow on Magnolia
